Literature.Title: EcDBS1R6: A novel cationic antimicrobial peptide derived from a signal peptide sequence.
Literature.Author: Porto WF, Irazazabal LN, Humblot V, Haney EF,  Ribeiro SM, Hancock REW, Ladram A, Franco OL

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=111.1±27.2 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=6.25µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=3µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=3µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=25µM),Listeria ivanovii Li 4pVS2(MIC=12.5µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=100µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=100µM)
